div.p: After adjournment of the Convention I went to Ricmond to bring to the notice of the Government the importance of defending south western viriginia and western rolece ohio and East-Tennessee. The same has been urged upon the authorities of both north and south Carolina. Effectual measures will no doubt be made to accomplish the measures of defence. The importance of which all room admit

An engineer will be sent to make a topographical survey of the portion of the Iron or Smokey Mountains that divides Western North Carolina from East Tennessee, with a viewe of creating forts - fixations at the French Broad. Pigeon oronalufta Tennessee and High Wapee Passes in the Iron Mountain very probably at the southern as well as the northern base.
